previewText: I am a student of the True Blade. Perhaps you’d like to match yours against mine? I guarantee we’ll both learn something.
benefit: You add Intimidate to your class skill list and give yourself a +3 bonus to Intimidate checks.
flavor: You are an itinerant warrior—sometimes a conscript, sometimes a mercenary, but often just a wanderer with a sharp sword and an empty coin-purse. How did you learn your initial training in the combat arts? Why haven’t you resorted to out-and-out banditry? What places have you visited in your wandering? What would it take for you to settle down?Good Background: Dragonborn.
name: Wandering Duelist
